title: Hot to trot! Amazing moment a horse is spotted dancing along to the music playing from a passing car
text:
A horse was caught on camera dancing in time to the music playing from a passing car.

A group of people were driving past Half Moon Bay, California when they came across the stallion being ridden by a man in a cowboy hat down the side of the road.

The animal clearly had rhythm as it moved its hooves in perfect time to the song being played from their car.

Luckily they were able to catch the amazing spectacle on video.

A horse was caught on camera dancing to music playing from a nearby car

A man is seen on horseback when suddenly the animal begins to step in time

'How are you making him do that?' asked one of the passengers in the car, clearly mesmerized by the horse's actions.

The experience left passengers in the car completely stunned by what they had just witnessed.

The horse's hooves lift up in perfect time to the music as passengers in the car are transfixes by the animal's actions

'I'm not sure if there are normally horses in the area, but there were three in a row just dancing along the sidewalk,' said California resident Jordan Podojil who was a passenger in the car.

'This one stopped for us because we were cheering and playing music with the windows down.'
description: A group of people were driving past Half Moon Bay, California when they came across the stallion - which moved its hooves in perfect time to the song being played from their car.
